text.headline: Elkhart Instructional Technology
text.text: Founded in 2016, the Elkhart Instructional Technology team has worked to develop and grow teachers in digital instructional.

text.headline: Technology Integration Specialist Team forms
text.text: The first official meeting of the Technology Integration Specialists.

text.headline: Tech Champion Teachers
text.text: Teachers selected to participate in the Tech Champions program. Teachers were given a Chromebook to use. Completion earned a Chromebook cart in the fall of 2016.

media.credit: 'Acer Chromebook 15' flickr photo by pestoverde shared under a Creative Commons (BY) license

text.headline: Google for Administrators
text.text: Administrative support is essential for successful instructional changes. Our administrators have had workshops to help them understand what changes to expect in teachers' classrooms.

media.url: Was dreading the Google training, but realized it's not as challenging as I thought. I am excited to use more than I have. Thank you for making it relevant and easy!
media.caption: Jennifer Hinman, Assistant Principal, Bristol Elementary School

text.headline: Canvas Basics
text.text: Tech Champion teachers could elect to attend a half-day training on the Canvas LMS.
